projects.dvarKanjiText: DVar Kanji is a system for studying Japanese hieroglyphs
projects.nihongoQuest: Visual novel for learning Japanese language
projects.dvarScript: DVarScript is an interpreted dynamically typed programming language. The interpreter is written in C#
projects.textExtractor: Desktop app for extracting text from images

about.aboutMe: I am an software engineer deeply passionate about the world of technology and programming. My drive to enhance user experience and find innovative solutions to real-world problems is a cornerstone of my professional approach. My goal is to create products capable of transforming the world and making it more accessible and convenient for all users.
